data.text: @DonEford @dianaberrent @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe Hi Don, do you have a source for these claims? Would like to read more about it, especially the three viral particles part. Thanks in advance
@dianaberrent @DonEford @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe I got COVID outdoors last august, it’s not always safe unfortunately.
@dianaberrent Scum like you made us wear crap even outside

@dianaberrent @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe This is very irresponsible behavior and I expect better from you. 1/3 of cases turn in to long Covid so you could have killed or permanently injured one of these people. Please stick to zoom!

@dianaberrent @rpetty @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe You can change the parameters--how many people, how long, etc. But this is what it says if you set it for outdoors, 1 ft apart, unmasked: https://t.co/8grLQGHL22
@RebeccaReal6 @rpetty @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe No that's not what it says. Go back and look.

@dianaberrent @rpetty @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe You can set it with whatever parameters you want. No matter what parameters you choose, it says that outdoors doesn’t make you safe if you’re close to other people while unmasked.

@RebeccaReal6 @rpetty @MayoClinic @moricemdphd @NickGuthe It talks about being at an outdoor party with 80 people. Not standing on a corner with two fully vaccinated people.

Details matter.
